summary.span: Определяет метод для добавления части разметки в пакет XPS.

span.span: Defines a method for adding the part of the markup to an XPS package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Дополнительные сведения о элемент [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] пакета, см. в разделе 9 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] спецификации, который можно получить в [XPS: спецификация и формировании](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=67000).For more information about the element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=67000).
